Stark Hall
You are here
  1. Home
  2. Lorem Ipsum
  3. This Page

Stark Hall, located on the Denton campus, is a 21-story building that offers double or triple occupancy rooms, each with a private bath. Sorority suites are located on three of the floors. Starkâ€™s lobby and living room are the sites for many small group activities.

Adjacent to Stark Hall, a computer lab and convenience store can be found in the Commons along with a space for study and large group activities.

  • Denton Campus
  • First-Year Students
  • Second-Year Students
  • Sorority Suites

Denton, TX 76204

Residence Hall Amenities

Break Housing

Important Information

Each room includes extra long twin bed(s), closet(s), desk and chair, and shades or blinds/curtains.

Students are required to purchase a Meal Plan (not eligible to purchase Commuter Meal Plan).

Cost Per Semester (Per Person)

  • Permanent Triple/Quad: $1,346
  • Double: $1,915
  • *Private $2,914

Note: Private rooms will be used to accommodate students with special needs.
